description:
This course is about the secrets the forex industry and brokers don't want you to know. I delve into a very strategic trading method which has helped grow my account to a phenomenal amount. The trading strategy was self-created while I was working at an fx broker. I tried multiple strategies and came across one that really worked. This is what I will teach you in this course.

I will also teach you how to avoid brokers that are scams. I will show you how to evaluate a broker and their website and to understand the terminology behind forex. I will also teach you all of the broker's tricks and explain to you the best method to avoid these tricks. I will be testing you along the way, so be attentive.

This will be a a great eye-opener into the forex industry and how to properly trade. Don't fall for the scams people. My course will be the yellow brick road to enlightenment in this subject. I hope you enjoy it.
title: Forex Scam: Avoid the scam today
